categoryByUrl.name: New Arrivals
categoryByUrl.title: Kids' New Arrivals
categoryByUrl.description: Give your child an all-new, playground-ready outfit with the latest PUMA apparel and accessories, featuring everything from fun graphic tees to moisture-wicking shorts and cozy hoodies. Color-blocked backpacks are bold enough to make an impact, but practical enough to take to school, high-stretch shirts offer total freedom of movement in the park, and caps feature playful graphics that make your child the main character of their world. When it comes to shoes, kids choose color, parents choose comfort, PUMA gives you both with the latest kids’ shoes. Let your child hit the playground in trendy sneakers, let them show off their identity, and let them run and play for hours in their new, super comfortable PUMA shoes. We have the icons, too, shrunk down for your child’s smaller foot while keeping the signature PUMA look. The latest footwear, apparel, and accessories are made just for your youngster.
